snippet: Red Bulls forward Thierry Henry, San Jose forward Chris Wondolowski and Kansas City midfielder Graham Zusi are the finalists for Major League Soccer’s Most Valuable Player award.
lead_paragraph: Red Bulls forward Thierry Henry, San Jose forward Chris Wondolowski and Kansas City midfielder Graham Zusi are the finalists for Major League Soccer’s Most Valuable Player award.

headline.main: Red Bulls’ Henry Is M.V.P. Finalist
